DOC.detailed_description: Protocol summary No . 2 research 0202-14 date : 22/11/2014 . Rationale research A deeper understand syncytiotrophoblast development process property may allow good understand placenta pathological process development treatment model relevant pregnancy complication . The aim study compare telomere length , aggregate formation , senescence marker syncytiotrophoblast placenta complicate pregnancy placenta normal pregnancy . Telomere lenght aggregate formation assess fluorescent intensity telomere FISH . Senescence assess immunohistochemistry marker - SAHF , cyclin dependent kinase inhibitor p16/p21 , HLAX , ERVWE1 , SA-B-gal . The study group 1 . A retrospective arm - paraffin block collect year placentas complicate pregnancy ( intrauterine growth restriction , preeclampsia , placenta accrete ) compare block placentas normal pregnancy . 2 . The prospective arm - placental complicate pregnancy ( intrauterine growth restriction , preeclampsia , placenta accrete ) . Will compare placenta normal pregnancy . 3 . A laboratory model base human placenta cell culture
